title: The Ladies sing the blues
brief_description: The dramatized life story of legendary songstress Billie Holliday. Containing film footage of the real Holliday, this documentary also offers rare clips of such blues greats as Dinah Washington, Bessie Smith, Lena Horne, Peggy Lee and Sarah Vaughn. Each performer is seen in her prime, backed up by such instrumental talent as Coleman Hawkins, Lester Young and Ben Webster. Includes footage of performances once considered lost.
